title: LAG
body: why am i lagging  IS IT BECAUSE YOUR SERVERS SUCKS OR IS IT BECAUSE YOUR RELEASING TO MUCH SHIET LIKE WTF I LOST @ OF MY RANKED GAMES CAUSE I KEPT LAGGING ON YOUR SERVERS LAST  RANK GAME I COULDN'T EVEN JOIN BACK PLS FIX YOUR SERVERS Immediately PLS I BEG {{champion:77}}

replies.body: I'd like to help you out, but I'll need you to be a bit more descriptive of the type of "lag" you've been experiencing. Are you seeing changes in latency (ping) or are you seeing FPS drops? Also, when you disconnect and aren't able to join a game, what kinds of errors are you seeing?

its all good now
I never lag out anymore {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
